title: Blood Lord Vladimir - In-Game Skin Issue

embed.description: League of Legends Blood Lord Vladimir Skin Spotlight. Purchase RP here and help support this channel via the amazon affiliate program (NA): http://amzn.to/2leXAxO Shows off Animations and Ability Effects of Vladimir on their Blood Lord Skin in this Spotlight. All footage was taken in game.

body: Recently purchased this skin and I'm very happy with it. Just one concern that bothers me is in the Blood Lord Vladimir Skin Spotlight, it appears that the skin contains "blood-mist" when he walks around (check the link). In game when I play, it doesn't appear. Any reason why this might have happened? Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey Arisoul! 

In the future, if you could post bugs [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), we can make sure they don't get lost. ^-^ 

I loaded him up in game, and it does look like the blood mist is there. Are you playing on low/very low settings, by chance? The lower graphics settings you use, the less blood mist you'll see, in order to maximize performance.
